bibl.title: Further Remarks on the Manichaean Nature of εὐχὴ τῶν προβολῶν (P. Kell. Gr. 98).
bibl.note: T. Kellis Gr. 98 (= LDAB 5523). - I. Monotheism versus Dualism. - II. Specific Manichaean mythologoumena. - III. "Neutral" language versus technici termini. - IV. Conclusions.
bibl.seg: BERMEJO RUBIO Fernando, Further Remarks on the Manichaean Nature of εὐχὴ τῶν προβολῶν (P. Kell. Gr. 98).
